Well, it’s actually will be implemented at saga 14.
We will get IM that can change our face (finally ;;)


<a href="http://www.econline.jp/news/information/updateinfo3111027.html">http://www.econline.jp/news/information/updateinfo3_111027.html
http://www.econline.jp/md/motion/face_switchers.html

Of course, since it was being overly cute, I can’t resist to try it out at myself @.@.
We don’t have that face yet, so I’ll need to implant that myself (many thanks to my friend, Torti and Filli which helps me accomplish this >.<)

 

If ECOid is going at this pace, I expect that it will be implemented around late 2014 ;_;
I hope I can surpress my desire to get that face for now @.@… for two years
